alert.note: Alert for Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 3:05PM CDT until April 14 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Long Prairie River at Long Prairie affecting Todd County. .The river gage at Long Prairie has been repaired and the forecast updated to reflect conditions. The river is currently running near its crest, and will remain high for the next few days. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Long Prairie River at Long Prairie. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, 1st Avenue SW becomes innundated. Lumber yard and produce store parking lots flood due to water backing up Venewitz Creek. Lions Westside park impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 215 PM CDT Thursday, the stage was 7.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 215 PM CDT Thursday was 7.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 6.2 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.1 feet on 03/17/2010. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
